title: card.triangulate Response Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description: Response containing triangulated location data and positioning information derived from cellular towers and Wi-Fi access points.

status.description: The current status of the triangulation operation

lat.description: The estimated latitude in degrees from triangulation

lon.description: The estimated longitude in degrees from triangulation

time.description: Unix epoch time in seconds when the triangulation was calculated

accuracy.description: Estimated accuracy of the triangulated position in meters

towers.description: Number of cellular towers used in the triangulation calculation

wifi.description: Number of Wi-Fi access points used in the triangulation calculation

on.description: Indicates whether triangulation mode is currently enabled

samples.title: Successful Triangulation
samples.description: Example response from a successful triangulation with location data

samples.title: Insufficient Data
samples.description: Example response when insufficient towers or access points are available

samples.title: Triangulation Disabled
samples.description: Example response when triangulation mode is disabled
